channel.title: Readings on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Readings on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Readings
item.description: In addition to the bibliography of readings used in the course, see the readings by session below. Required Text Pratt, J. Financial Accounting in an Economic Context. 5th ed. Cincinnati, Ohio: John Wiley & Sons, 2003. ISBN: 0470000465. (Hereafter cited as “Pratt”) Required Case Packet Includes supplemental readings and Harvard Business School cases. (Hereafter cited as “CP”) Required case studies are: Wilson, David A. “Chemalite, Inc.” Boston, MA: Harvard Business School, 1976.
